prompt: Quero um código que instancia inimigos a cada dez segundos em mapa.
generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: SpawnEnemy
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Spawna inimigos no mapa a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")

-- Configurações de spawn de inimigos
local SPAWN_INTERVAL = 10 -- segundos
local ENEMY_NAME = "Zombie"
local ENEMY_HEALTH = 50
local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

-- Configurações de spawn de inimigos
local SPAWN_INTERVAL = 10 -- segundos
local ENEMY_NAME = "Zombie"
local ENEMY_HEALTH = 50
local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

metadata.description: Spawna inimigos no mapa a cada X segundos em posições aleatórias.

prompt: Gerar um script em Lua que spawna adversários no mundo a cada 10 segundos.
generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: SpawnEnemy
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Spawna inimigos no mapa a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")

-- Configurações de spawn de inimigos
local SPAWN_INTERVAL = 10 -- segundos
local ENEMY_NAME = "Zombie"
local ENEMY_HEALTH = 50
local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

-- Configurações de spawn de inimigos
local SPAWN_INTERVAL = 10 -- segundos
local ENEMY_NAME = "Zombie"
local ENEMY_HEALTH = 50
local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

prompt: Gerar um sistema que gera monstros a cada 10 segundos no mundo.
generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: SpawnEnemy
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Spawna inimigos no mapa a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")

-- Configurações de spawn de inimigos
local SPAWN_INTERVAL = 10 -- segundos
local ENEMY_NAME = "Zombie"
local ENEMY_HEALTH = 50
local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end

prompt: Criar um sistema que spawna NPCs no mapa a cada dez segundos para jogadores.
generated_lua:
--[[
    Script: SpawnEnemy
    Local: ServerScriptService
    Autor: Gerado por Script Python
    Descrição: Spawna inimigos no mapa a cada X segundos.
]]

-- Serviços necessários
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")

-- Configurações de spawn de inimigos
local SPAWN_INTERVAL = 10 -- segundos
local ENEMY_NAME = "Zombie"
local ENEMY_HEALTH = 50
local ENEMY_DAMAGE = 10
local SPAWN_POSITION = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

-- Função que spawna um inimigo no mapa
local function spawnEnemy()
    local enemy = Instance.new("Model")
    enemy.Name = ENEMY_NAME
    local humanoid = Instance.new("Humanoid")
    humanoid.MaxHealth = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Health = ENEMY_HEALTH
    humanoid.Parent = enemy
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
    part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2)
    part.Position = Vector3.new(
        SPAWN_POSITION.X + math.random(-20, 20),
        SPAWN_POSITION.Y,
        SPAWN_POSITION.Z + math.random(-20, 20)
    )
    part.Parent = enemy
    enemy.PrimaryPart = part
    enemy.Parent = Workspace
    local script = Instance.new("Script")
    script.Name = "AttackScript"
    script.Source = [[
        local humanoid = script.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
        local damage = ENEMY_DAMAGE
        humanoid.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
            local playerHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            if playerHumanoid then
                playerHumanoid:TakeDamage(damage)
            end
        end)
    ]]
    script.Parent = enemy
end

-- Loop principal para spawnar inimigos
while true do
    spawnEnemy()
    wait(SPAWN_INTERVAL)
end
